/opt/local/bin/gcc   -fopenmp -g  -Wl,-search_paths_first -Wl,-headerpad_max_install_names   -Wl,-headerpad_max_install_names  -Wl,-flat_namespace  -Wl,-commons,use_dylibs CMakeFiles/mVMC.dir/vmcmain.c.o CMakeFiles/mVMC.dir/sfmt/SFMT.c.o  -o mVMC  -L/Users/k-yoshimi/program/mVMC_develop/src/main/src/pfapack  -L/opt/local/lib  -framework Accelerate -framework Accelerate /opt/local/lib/mpich-mp/libmpi.dylib /opt/local/lib/mpich-mp/libpmpi.dylib -lpfapack -lscalapack -lpthread -lm -lvecLibFort -Wl,-rpath,/Users/k-yoshimi/program/mVMC_develop/src/main/src/pfapack -Wl,-rpath,/opt/local/lib
